overview: His personality is different. As a child he clung to his mother, he cried for days when she passed away, just like a woman, some opined. People talk about him and analyse him in various ways. Why can’t they just let him be? He will rise and accept him as he is. His faith in god and some positive thoughts will help him overcome the distress that he is going through in life. He is a wee bit different than the other men and that is nothing to be ashamed of…
title: Akam
